definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Door hinged on the left hand side, one-hand operation, lockable.
sentences.chinese: 门绞链在左面，单手操作，有门锁。

sentences.english: One hand operation, takes less than 20 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 单手操作，整个工作只需不到20秒。

sentences.english: Each knife opened smoothly one handed.
sentences.chinese: 每把刀都可以单手顺利打开。

sentences.english: One of my dreams is to do a one-arm pullup.
sentences.chinese: 我的梦想之一是单手垂挂。

sentences.english: People want a device where they can have a free hand.
sentences.chinese: 人们想要一个单手即可持有的装置。

sentences.english: Assists one-handed dressing by passing through button hole and gripping thread of button.
sentences.chinese: 助攻单手穿衣透过按钮孔与按键夹持螺纹合格。

sentences.english: Sneakattacks do 6x damage with one-handed weapons.
sentences.chinese: 潜行攻击时用单手武器获得6倍伤害。

sentences.english: She’s tall, muscular, and uses a one-handed backhand.
sentences.chinese: 她身高马大，肌肉健硕，经常使得单手的反手。

sentences.english: Some one-hand spell power weapons are now main hand only.
sentences.chinese: 部分提供法术能量加成的单手武器现在仅能主手使用。

sentences.english: The forward /reverse switch is designed according to ergonomics allowing the one-handed operation.
sentences.chinese: 反转切换开关符合人机工程尺寸，可以单手切换操作。

sentences.english: I can clap with one hand. Just looks retarded. No benefits what soever.
sentences.chinese: 我能用单手鼓掌，看起来像是个智障，没什么好处。

sentences.english: Lightly armoured in leather and equipped with a hand weapon and a lance.
sentences.chinese: 这些轻枪骑兵身穿皮甲，装备骑枪和单手短兵刃。

sentences.english: As for the actual solving part of OH cubing.
sentences.chinese: 至于实际解决部分单手情况时。

sentences.english: This is the ultimate in one-hand openers.
sentences.chinese: 这是单手开刀的终极解决方案。

sentences.english: She has now created her own One Hand Typing and Keyboarding Manual.
sentences.chinese: 利丽现在已经独立编制了单手打字和键盘使用手册。

sentences.english: Super lightweight design to be maneuvered with only one hand easily.
sentences.chinese: 即使单手也能轻松操作的超轻量设计。

definition: to turn a hand over/to put one's hand behind one's back/fig. easily done
the five fingers of one's hand
be high up in the sky
left and right hands/(fig.) capable assistant/right-hand man
